description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Lake Tekapo, New Zealand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Serene Self-Contained Apartment Stay near Lake Tekapo with Tranquil Pool, Hot Tub & BBQ Entertainment Area
hotels.description: Discover the beauty of New Zealand's South Island with a charming self-contained apartment stay moments from the spectacular Lake Tekapo. Take in breathtaking alpine vistas and huddle around the outdoor fireplace on chilly evenings. If you wish to explore, a visit to the Aoraki Mackenzie International Dark Sky Reserve is a must for stargazers. Back at the property, cook up a feast with the BBQ facilities, or take a dip in the heated outdoor pool or hot tub.

hotels.title: Secluded Alpine Lakefront Escape Overlooking Lake Tekapo with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Soak up the alpine beauty of New Zealand's Southern Alps from this tranquil resort, perfectly placed on the pristine shores of Lake Tekapo and nestled amid the scenic landscapes of Mackenzie Basin. Boasting stylish studios and self-contained villas, you can spend your days exploring the nearby Church of the Good Shepherd and stargazing at the world-renowned Dark Sky Project, or hiking the picturesque mountain trails. Back at the resort, you can savour local flavours at the Rakinui Restaurant or sip on a drink at the cosy lounge bar, all while taking in the breathtaking lake vistas.
